Text.val: // Author: Peter van der Veen; created 17.07.2001
27.08.2014 SH SCR19032 Added BPH101.PI.SKIP_DATABASE_UPDATES (parameter is skipped)
04.07.2014 SH SCR19007 BPH223C, C1, C2 Added update new TMPJ fields (TMPJ_AMOUNTDESKTOPCURR, TMPJ_AMOUNTCREDITCURR and
10.07.2013 SH SCR18237 Added BPH104.PI.IBANDEBTOR and BPH104.PI.SWIFTDEBTOR
21.06.2012 SH SCR17392 Moved part to recalc v.GSBU_AMOUNT(1106) BankCurr below part where client is determined to achieve
proper selection of GSBU
04.06.2012 SH SCR17281 Redesigned BPH223C1-C3 modules (introduced events to keep thr program readable; renamed 232C3 in 223C9
and added new module BPH223C4 - Auto. paymenthandling RF (not yet fully implemented)
09.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Added BPH104.PI.BANK_ADMNO = BADP_BANK_ADMNO
02.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
27.04.2011 SH SCR16390 Added missing test on GSBU_OFFICE = CLNT203_OFFICE
18.94.2011 GB SCR16390 Changed condition for call the GB002
17.08.2010 SH SCR15725 Added BPH104.PO.SFIP_NO and call of BSF106
25.08.2009 SH SCR14729 Added BPH104.PI.TESTBANKACCOUNT= 'Y'
04.08.2009 SH SCR14771 Added BPH101.PO.PAYMENTINBATCH
05.11.2007 SH SCR13076 Changed logic to use BANK_ADMNO1/BNKA_CLNTNO1 as
arguments for diff. program calls; if BNKA_ADMNO1/BNKA_CLNTNO1 = 3/3 then
BADP_ADMNOINITIAL/BADP_CLNTNOINITIAL are used (special for belgium bankfiles)
05.11.2007 SH SCR13034 Added BPH104.PI.WKAACCOUNT = BNKA_WKA_ACCOUNT
15.12.2005 AK SCR9803 BADP_PAYMENTVALUEDATE to list of arguments for BPH101
05.12.2005 SH SCR9683 Added PO.CHQE_ID to argument list of BPH101, not in used
30.08.2005 SH SCR8979 Added new module BPH223C4
09.08.2005 SH SCR8756 Part2 Extended test to perform part with
BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT <> 5
20.07.2005 SH SCR8548 Fixed bug according to recalc of GSET_AMOUNT (106)
13.07.2005 SH SCR8473 Added new arguments for BPH104 and BPH106
30.06.2005 SH SCR8548 Part2 Changed test to perform part from
BPIV_AMOUNTACCCURR < 0 to BPIV_AMOUNTACCCURR < GSET_AMOUNT (106)
21.04.2005 SH SCR 8163 Add new parameter PI.BADT_DATLASTDAILYSTATEMENT
07.04.2005 SH SCR8072 Restructured module BPB223C
23.03.2005 SH SCR8009 Added new arguments for BPH105
20.08.2004 SH SCR6809 Added new para PIO.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS and also
added to the call to BPH224
19.02.2004 SH SCR5575 Extended CND "BADP_BANK_CURRENCY <> GNRL_CURRENCY and
-CLNT108_ACC_CURR = GNRL_CURRENCY" with " and PO.LEDGER = 0", uses
- to update TMPJ fields
29.11.2003 SH SCR4905 Extended CND to handle the remaining payments with
- not(BADP_BANK_CURRENCY <> GNRL_CURRENCY and
-CLNT108_ACC_CURR = GNRL_CURRENCY))
14.05.2003 SH SCR3517 Extended condition to book payment by administration
11.11.2002 SCR2503 Add 2 new arguments to list for BPH101
- TMPJ_AMOUNTDESKTOP and TMPJ_AMOUNTCREDIT
28.10.2002 SCR2440 SH Add BADP_BANKID, BADP_BANKACCOUNT and
-BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT to list of arguments for BPH101
14.10.2002 SH Add two new arguments to end of list for call BPH115
10.10.2002 SH Changed list of arguments for BPH105 according to SPECS, because
- BPD105 never willl be made updates to the physical BADP row which is opnend in
- the current task
07.10.2002 SH Add new parameter PIO.BADT_ONDESKTOP
18.09.2002 SH switch BPH101 to parameter and add all necessarily arguments to
the list of arguments, the changes of BADP fields in BPH101 will be now made in
this program (Problem: Error --> "Record has been updated")
//29-08-2002 JP switch BPH224 to paramter and add BADT_BALDAILYSTATEMENT to list
15.08.2002 SH Add new argument for call to BPH101 "BADT_NPAYMENTSHANDLED",
- BPH101 will make updates to this field if some test in BPH101 are OK.
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Add new parameter "PI.BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER" to obtain
- table BADT with primary key and used as argument for diff. calls
-- 20.03.2002 SH Implemented diff. changes according to new SPECS
-- SCR#764 06.02.2002 SH (created virtuals, which used as parameter if
BPH 224 called in T.S.)
From TMPJ_LINENO onwards
// Invoice variables 1 - 10
// Invo_no's
-- Used to call BPH224 Final bookings in the T.S.
-- used to test if automatic ledger bookings possible
// BPH 224 Final actions at BADT level
-- Set/reset virtuals
-- Normally payments of one bankaccount have to be booked to the same client,
but in case of BNKA_ADMNO1 = 3 and BNKA_CLNTNO1 = 3 (belguim clients)
payments of multiple clients of one bankaccount have to be handled, see also
-- Recalculate GSET_AMOUNT (GSET_ID=106), used for condition to perfrom Part 2 (only once per run)
-- Updated virtulas used as arguments for call BPH224 in T.S.
... in case of direct payments the payment can be booked automatically
(Test on BTCH_CODETYPEACCOUNT = 5 is performed in subtask)
... reverse factoring
-- Final bookings if BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT / INVOICE are handled

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(A.INVO_AACTUALI) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO A where A.INVO_DEBH_NO = :2 and A.INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and A.INVO_CURRENCY = ':3' and A.INVO_AACTUALI > (select coalesce(sum(B.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV),0) from :1/BPIV B where B.BPIV_INVO_NO = A.INVO_NO and B.BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE is null) for fetch only

select cast(sum(C.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BPIV C join :1/INVO A on A.INVO_DEBH_NO = :2 and A.INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and A.INVO_CURRENCY = ':3' and A.INVO_AACTUALI > (select coalesce(sum(B.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV),0) from :1/BPIV B where B.BPIV_INVO_NO = A.INVO_NO and B.BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE is null) where C.BPIV_INVO_NO = A.INVO_NO and C.BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE is null for fetch only

select A.INVO_NO, A.INVO_DUEDATE, A.INVO_AACTUALI from :1/INVO A where A.INVO_DEBH_NO = :2 and A.INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and A.INVO_CURRENCY = ':3' and A.INVO_AACTUALI > (select coalesce(sum(B.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV),0) from :1/BPIV B where B.BPIV_INVO_NO = A.INVO_NO and B.BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE is null) order by A.INVO_DUEDATE, A.INVO_AACTUALI for fetch only
select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_INVO_NO = :2 and BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE is null for fetch only

Text.val: -- Final bookings if BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT / INVOICE are handled
